so whos gonna help me here to get my wifi up

what is the make and model of your wifi-card
and you need to be connected to internet with ethernet to be able to download drivers
you can find additional drivers from somewhere in xubuntu aswell, i just don't recall what is correct menu for that
you can find the same menu from xubuntu aswell, just browse thru menus
so you have active ethernet-connection there now?
if yes, just install ubuntu-desktop metapackage
